name: ONIROGU
description:
鬼ログ

You're just a regular ninja trying to practice their kunai throwing skills, but something's not right in the forest today... Only the strong will survive the onslaught of demon logs!!!

Press the trigger to equip a kunai and one of the thumb buttons to equip a paper bomb. Drop the bomb on a kunai to arm it! There is snap turning as well if you move the thumbstick. Oh and there's hand physics, so slap whatever you want!

This game was made in 7 days for the VR Jam 2020. The theme was One Tool, Many Uses. I loved  the theme! And what better tools than ninja tools?? But I only got the throwing and paper bombs working before the deadline. My next mechanic was to attach a mini parachute to the kunai so you could set up floating traps around you!

Ultra credits and kudos to Nathan Tullis for help with production, art, and design. And the amazing score was produced by Alexandre Jannuzzi.

I hope you enjoy it!

-Wyattari
